name: Hack, Duck, Pray
description:
A small game inspired by Mörk Borg, numbers, speed & the color yellow.

You are still running.
Always forward, faster and faster.
Hands are swords.

Using your keybord keys (1 - 2 - 3) highly recommended.

1: HACK-> d6 + STRNGTH for you vs. your Foe. If you survive, you get a point.

2: DUCK-> you get a new Foe, but no score.

3: PRAY-> you heal your wounds, you get a new Foe but lose a point.

Every 3 points will randomize your body. For better. Possibly worse.
